name: baby hippo moo deng
notes:
always sassy and cute, here is a baby hippo amigurumi inspired by moo deng, the pygmy hippo at the thailand zoo.  she loves water and the hose.  she loves to eat, and she loves taking a gummy bite of the zookeeper!

this free crochet moo deng pattern features includes a large snout, small ears, pink underbelly and tongue.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`

**approximate size of moo deng hippo:**
7in long and 4 in tall (18cm long and 10 cm tall)

i'd love to see how your baby hippo turns out!

tag me with your projects on my [instagram @ami_amour.][1]

you can also crochet along with me on the [crochet baby hippo video tutorial][2] on my youtube channel.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**level:** easy intermediate

**need to know:**
single crochet in the round
increase and decrease
chain
slip stitch
color changes


  [1]: https://www.instagram.com/ami_amour
  [2]: https://youtu.be/wzmnpze39zs
